sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Fort Sheridan Retrocession Act.

sections.heading: Pursuant to the provisions of an Act of Congress entitled "An
sections.text:
Act to authorize the Secretary of the Army to adjust the legislative
jurisdiction exercised by the United States over land within the Fort
Sheridan Military Reservation, Illinois", approved August 25, 1961, and
known as Public Law 87-160 of the Eighty-seventh Congress, the State of
Illinois hereby accepts retrocession of legislative jurisdiction over
such land as may be relinquished from Federal jurisdiction by the
Secretary of the Army, pursuant to the provisions of said Public Law
87-160 of the Eighty-seventh Congress.
